resources.string: When you click on the Hotel button below, you will send a broadcast intent to App 2 and 3. The matching receiver in App2 will display Hotel toast message on screen. Later the matching receiver in App3 will display hotel fragments

When you click on the Restaurant button below, you will send a broadcast intent to App 2 and 3. The matching receiver in App2 will display Restaurant toast message on screen. Later the matching receiver in App3 will display Restaurant fragments
